Articles.Content: This is my first game on Steam, I am really looking forward to have fun!
And so you shall. Welcome to the forum.
Do not expect to buy more. This is all you need. Except for Civilization V. That game is fun.

This is my first game on Steam, I am really looking forward to have fun!

Fun? This game is amazing! Tbh, I havnt played any other game since I got it a year ago. I simply love it and im sure you will too.

Happy landings pilot
May the Kraken bless you with endless joy.
Welcome aboard! TBH, I would not get steam for KSP only. BUT! KSP is a wonderful game, and i'm sure you'll enjoy it.

I played EVE: Online for two years solid, was active in the game and community, and tripped over KSP one day. Two weeks later I left EVE and have played pretty much nothing but KSP since. Hasn't been two years yet, but I haven't even begun to touch what this game has to offer, and I hope you find as much enjoyment out of it as I have. Welcome to the club!

Do not expect to buy more. This is all you need. Except for Civilization V. That game is fun.

disregard that statement. you will buy WAYYYYY too many games on steam sale day.

Same here. Haven't played videogames since my teen years. Then discovered KSP some 20yrs later... and after about 100hrs of gameplay on my sons' gamer PC and steam account I had to go and get me a proper laptop and my own steam account... was kinda fed up with him monitoring my KSP hours

I don't think I will buy any other games anytime soon, or install anything else than KSP on my new laptop. That game is really that good, I would have never believed I get sucked into "gaming" again.

Only thing that is really a problem right now is switching that thing off. I guess we all know what I am talking about here
